default: You're looking for the Chief? I last saw him hanging out in the second jail cell.
Not the other jail cell, that guy in there is creepy. I wouldn't trust him if I were you.
chief: We need to find the JAIL KEY!
jail key: You have the JAIL KEY now. Check your inventory by pressing SHIFT on the keyboard.
use jail key chief: Way to go solving that mystery!
use jail key stinky: It's fun to cause a little bit of chaos, isn't it?
